text: Broadus is a town in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Powder River County. As of the 2020 United States Census, there were 456 people. The Broadus post office was created in 1900. Broadus became the county seat in 1920. ==References== Category:Towns in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:1900s establishments in Montana Category:1900 establishments in the United States
title: Broadus, Montana
